content.rendered:
• Type : Ladders
  • Height : 2.6 meters
  • Capacity : Up to 150kgs
  • EN131 Standard
  • 8 Rungs
  • Weight: Approx. 9.4kgs

Item dimensions LxWxH 2.6 x 4 Meters
